InstructionData.Title: Temperature Reader
InstructionData.Description: Reads temperature from a sensor. Optionally converts to Celsius.
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Temperature Reader​ # Model: TR-102​ # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library​ alias Sensor d0​ alias Mode d1 # 0=kelvin, 1=celcius​ alias Bias d2​ alias temperature r0​ alias mode r1​ alias bias r2​ alias t0 r10​ move mode 0​ move bias 0​ start:​ l temperature Sensor Temperature​ bdns Mode nomode​ l mode Mode Setting​ nomode:​ bdns Bias nobias​ l bias Bias Setting​ nobias:​ add temperature temperature bias​ blez mode outputtemp​ sub temperature temperature 273.15​ outputtemp:​ s db Setting temperature​ yield​ j start
